The user first surrounds themselves with [[Amaterasu]] before proceeding to [[Blaze Release: Kagutsuchi|shape them]] into spikes, impaling anyone within their immediate vicinity.

== Influence ==
* Honoikazuchi is one of eight thunder gods that were born from [[wikipedia:Izanami|Izanami]]'s body in the underworld, specifically from her chest.

== Trivia ==
* Despite Blaze Release: Kagutsuchi being a [[Mangekyō Sharingan]] technique, Sasuke used this technique while having his normal [[Sharingan]] activated.
